sections.title_cn: 1. 本机构及从业人员（含董事、监事、高级管理人员）
sections.title_en: 1. The organization and its employees (including directors, supervisors, and senior managers)
sections.body_cn: 和本机构受益所有人涉及重大违法犯罪行为的情况；
sections.body_en: And the beneficial owners of this organization are involved in major illegal and criminal acts;

sections.title_cn: 2. 本机构已获知的客户涉及跨国（境）或具有重大社会
sections.title_en: 2. The clients that this agency has learned about involve transnational (border) or have major social
sections.body_cn: 影响的洗钱、恐怖融资和相关犯罪活动的情况；
sections.body_en: Situations affecting money laundering, terrorist financing and related criminal activities;

sections.title_cn: 3. 本机构公司治理、内部控制、信息系统建设与信息安
sections.title_en: 3. The organization’s corporate governance, internal control, information system construction and information security
sections.body_cn: 全等对反洗钱履职具有重要影响的风险事件或处罚情况；
sections.body_en: Risk events or penalties that have a significant impact on the performance of anti-money laundering duties;

sections.title_cn: 4. 本机构境外分支机构、子公司或同一集团内境外金融
sections.title_en: 4. Overseas branches, subsidiaries of this institution or overseas financial institutions within the same group
sections.body_cn: 机构受到当地反洗钱监管部门处罚或惩戒的情况；
sections.body_en: The institution is punished or disciplined by local anti-money laundering regulatory authorities;

sections.title_cn: 5. 其他可能对本机构反洗钱履职或洗钱风险管理造成
sections.title_en: 5. Other possible consequences for the institution’s anti-money laundering performance or money laundering risk management
sections.body_cn:
重大影响，或者可能造成反洗钱相关重大舆情的事件。
（二）金融机构应当在次年 1 月底前向反洗钱监管行提
交经本机构主要负责人审签的反洗钱年度工作报告，包括但
不限于机构概况、反洗钱工作整体情况、洗钱和恐怖融资风
险评估情况、洗钱风险管理情况、反洗钱工作配合情况、重
大风险事件汇总、监管项目后续整改进展，以及中国人民银
行反洗钱部门要求报送的其他情况。
本通知自 XXXX 年 XX 月 XX 日起施行。《中国人民银
行办公厅关于落实〈金融机构反洗钱监督管理办法（试行）〉
有关事项的通知》（银办发〔2014〕263 号文印发）同时废止。
4

附件 1：由中国人民银行总行负责反洗钱监管的法人金
融机构名单；
附件 2：由实际经营地中国人民银行分支机构负责反洗
钱监管的法人金融机构名单。
5

法人金融机构名单
序号 机构名称 反洗钱监管行

sections.body_en:
Major impact, or events that may cause major public opinion related to anti-money laundering.
(2) Financial institutions shall submit a report to the anti-money laundering regulatory authority before the end of January of the following year.
The annual anti-money laundering work report submitted to the principal person in charge of the institution for review and approval, including the following:
Not limited to institutional profile, overall anti-money laundering work, money laundering and terrorist financing risks
risk assessment, money laundering risk management, anti-money laundering cooperation, important
Summary of major risk events, subsequent rectification progress of regulatory projects, and the People’s Bank of China
Other circumstances required to be reported by the anti-money laundering department of the bank.
This notice will come into effect on XX, XX, XXXX. "People's Bank of China"
The General Office of the Bank of China regarding the implementation of the "Measures for the Supervision and Administration of Anti-Money Laundering by Financial Institutions (Trial)"
Notice on Relevant Matters (issued by Yinbanfa [2014] No. 263) shall be abolished at the same time.
4

Attachment 1: Legal person financial institutions responsible for anti-money laundering supervision by the Head Office of the People’s Bank of China
List of financial institutions;
Attachment 2: The branch of the People’s Bank of China at the actual place of business is responsible for anti-laundering
List of corporate financial institutions under financial supervision.
5

Annex 1
List of corporate financial institutions that are responsible for anti-money laundering supervision by the Head Office of the People's Bank of China
Serial number Organization name Headquarters location

Annex 2

Serial number Institution name Anti-money laundering regulatory agency

大风险事件汇总、监管项目后续整改进展，以及中国人民银
行反洗钱部门要求报送的其他情况。
本通知自 XXXX 年 XX 月 XX 日起施行。《中国人民银
行办公厅关于落实〈金融机构反洗钱监督管理办法（试行）〉
有关事项的通知》（银办发〔2014〕263 号文印发）同时废止。

融机构名单；
附件 2：由实际经营地中国人民银行分支机构负责反洗

(2) Financial institutions shall submit a report to the anti-money laundering regulatory authority before the end of January of the following year.
The annual anti-money laundering work report submitted to the principal person in charge of the institution for review and approval, including the following:
Not limited to institutional profile, overall anti-money laundering work, money laundering and terrorist financing risks
risk assessment, money laundering risk management, anti-money laundering cooperation, important
Summary of major risk events, subsequent rectification progress of regulatory projects, and the People’s Bank of China
Other circumstances required to be reported by the anti-money laundering department of the bank.
This notice will come into effect on XX, XX, XXXX. "People's Bank of China"
The General Office of the Bank of China regarding the implementation of the "Measures for the Supervision and Administration of Anti-Money Laundering by Financial Institutions (Trial)"
Notice on Relevant Matters (issued by Yinbanfa [2014] No. 263) shall be abolished at the same time.
